title: Route Matcher
description: Simulate a navigation router that matches URL paths to screen names, including path parameters.
instructions: Create a Router class that registers routes with patterns like '/users/{id}' and matches incoming paths. Print the matched screen and extracted parameters.

hints.text: Split both pattern and path by '/' and compare segments
Segments wrapped in {} are parameters to extract

commonMistakes.consequence: Router matches but loses parameter values
commonMistakes.correction: When a pattern segment has {}, extract the path segment as that param
Normalize paths by removing trailing slashes

commonMistakes.mistake: Matching by contains instead of exact path
commonMistakes.correction: Compare segment by segment for exact matching
